oai_dc:dc.dc:title: National Institute of Agricultural Botany (NIAB): Field trial facilities
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cereals, pulses and oilseeds
Breeding, genetics and propagation
Vegetables
Crop husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Access to organic research sites on grower holdings. Access to a wide range of non-organic arable and vegetable growing situations. Specialist irrigated facilities at Cambridge for plant disease work.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Facility} NIAB: National Institute of Agricultural Botany (NIAB): Field trial facilities. Facility Leader(s): Kerr, Simon, National Institute of Agricultural Botany.
